item.title: 早间竞标日本交易刺激市场
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 赛默飞工具和服务需求强劲，季度业绩超出预期
item.description: 赛默飞（Thermo Fisher）周三公布的第二季度利润和收入超出华尔街预期，主要得益于市场对其用于开发疗法的产品和服务的稳定需求。【原文：Thermo Fisher on Wednesday beat Wall Street estimates for second-quarter profit and revenue, helped by steady demand for its products and services used for developing therapies.】

item.title: 孩之宝因 "魔法集结 "游戏需求强劲而上调年度收入预期
item.description: 孩之宝公司（Hasbro）周三上调了年度营收预期，这家玩具制造商将依靠 "魔法集结"（Magic: The Gathering）游戏的优势和削减成本的努力来抵御日益加剧的经济和关税不确定性带来的影响。【原文：Hasbro raised its annual revenue forecast on Wednesday, as the toymaker leans on strength of "Magic: The Gathering" games and cost-cutting efforts to weather the impact from mounting economic and tariff uncertainty.】

item.title: AT&T 捆绑计划刺激用户激增，节税为光纤扩张提供资金支持
item.description: AT&T 的季度利润超出预期，新增无线用户也超过预期，原因是客户纷纷购买其结合了 5G 移动和高速光纤计划的打折捆绑产品。【原文：AT&T beat quarterly profit estimates and added more wireless subscribers than expected as customers flocked to its discounted bundles combining 5G mobile and high-speed fiber plans.】

item.title: 苹果和谷歌在移动生态系统方面面临更多英国反垄断审查
item.description: 英国竞争监管机构表示，它计划因苹果和谷歌在移动生态系统中的作用而授予它们所谓的战略市场地位，同时加强对它们所谓的双头垄断的审查。【原文：Britain's competition regulator said it plans to designate Apple and Google with so-called strategic market status for their role in mobile ecosystems, as it steps up scrutiny of what it has described as their duopoly.】

item.title: 印度 Infosys 受益于银行和金融部门实力增强，收窄了年度业绩预期
item.description: 印度 Infosys 公司周三发布的第一季度财报显示，在金融服务部门增长的推动下，该公司全年收入强于预期，但其全年业绩预期有所收窄。【原文：India's Infosys narrowed its full-year forecast on Wednesday after reporting stronger-than-expected revenue for the first quarter, driven by growth in its financial services segment.】

item.title: 法国称与俄语网络犯罪论坛有关的嫌疑人在乌克兰被捕
item.description: 法国检察院周三表示，在法国警方和欧洲刑警组织的协助下，一名涉嫌担任俄语网络犯罪论坛 XSS.is 管理员的人在乌克兰被捕。【原文：A person suspected of being the administrator for the Russian language cybercriminal forum XSS.is was arrested in Ukraine, with the assistance of the French police and Europol, the French Public Prosecutor's Office said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 支付公司 Corpay 以 22 亿美元收购英国 Alpha 集团
item.description: 商业支付公司 Corpay 周三表示，它将以 22 亿美元的价格收购英国金融服务提供商 Alpha Group。【原文：Business payments firm Corpay said on Wednesday it would buy British financial services provider Alpha Group in a $2.2 billion deal.】

item.title: 美日贸易协议避免了全球经济的最坏情况
item.description: 经济学家们表示，日本与美国达成的贸易协议可以作为目前正在与华盛顿谈判的许多其他协议的基准，全球经济差不多可以支持一夜之间达成的 15%的水平。【原文：Japan's trade agreement with the U.S. could serve as the benchmark for many other deals currently being negotiated with Washington, and the global economy could just about support the 15% level agreed overnight, economists said.】

item.title: 美日贸易协议提振华尔街期货
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普总统与日本达成贸易协议后，美国股指期货周三跳涨，随着8月1日最后期限的临近，这增强了人们对达成更多此类协议的预期。【原文：U.S. stock index futures jumped on Wednesday after President Donald Trump struck a trade deal with Japan, bolstering expectations of more such agreements as the August 1 deadline approaches.】

item.title: 摩根大通全球并购主管艾扬格表示，更多巨型交易正在酝酿中
item.description: 摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase）的交易人员预测，随着高管们越来越适应动荡的市场和变幻莫测的世界政治，今年下半年全球企业将寻求更大规模的交易。【原文：Companies worldwide are pursuing bigger deals in the second half of this year as executives get increasingly comfortable with volatile markets and unpredictable world politics, dealmakers at JPMorgan Chase forecast.】

item.title: 美股巨头公布财报，市场集中度风险凸显
item.description: 华尔街依靠少数高市值股票维持美国股市牛市势头的做法，将在未来几天的主要科技和成长型公司财报中经受考验。【原文：Wall Street's reliance on a small number of high market-value stocks to keep momentum going for the U.S. equities bull market will be tested in coming days as major technology and growth companies report earnings.】

item.title: 美国需求复苏，希尔顿上调 2025 年利润预期
item.description: 由于美国的旅游需求从 3 月和 4 月的低迷中复苏，酒店运营商希尔顿全球上调了 2025 年的利润预期。【原文：Hotel operator Hilton Worldwide lifted its forecast for 2025 profit, as travel demand in the U.S. recovers from a downturn in March and April.】

item.title: 被高度做空的 Krispy Kreme、GoPro 跳涨，meme 股继续反弹
item.description: 在零售交易员纷纷涌入百货公司科尔（Kohl's）的前一天，包括 Krispy Kreme 和 GoPro 在内的一些高度缺货公司的股价在周三的盘前交易中跳涨，这得益于这些公司的名字在社交媒体论坛上成为热门话题。【原文：Shares of some highly-shorted companies, including Krispy Kreme and GoPro, jumped in premarket trading on Wednesday, aided by their names trending on social media forums a day after retail traders piled into department store company Kohl's.】

item.title: 解释器：什么是代币化，它是加密货币的下一件大事吗？
item.description: 代币化一直是加密货币爱好者的热门词汇，他们多年来一直认为，基于区块链的资产将改变金融市场的底层基础设施。【原文：Tokenization has long been a buzzword for crypto enthusiasts, who have been arguing for years that blockchain-based assets will change the underlying infrastructure of financial markets.】

item.title: 绿色债券发行量因气候问题出尔反尔而下降近三分之一
item.description: 新数据显示，在美国和欧洲气候变化政策倒退的背景下，今年政府、银行和公司出售的 "绿色 "债券数量下滑了近三分之一。【原文：The amount of "green" bonds sold by governments, banks and companies has slumped by almost a third this year amid the rollback of climate change policies in the United States and Europe, new figures show.】

item.title: TE Connectivity 预计第四季度业绩强劲，发布乐观的季度业绩报告
item.description: TE Connectivity 公司周三发布了对第四季度的乐观预期，此前在工业产品强劲需求的推动下，该公司第三季度的利润和收入均好于预期。【原文：TE Connectivity issued an upbeat forecast for the fourth quarter on Wednesday, following better-than-expected third-quarter profit and revenue results driven by strong demand for its industrial products.】

item.title: 在与中国的科技之争中，特朗普将概述人工智能的优先事项
item.description: 特朗普政府将于周三发布一份新的人工智能蓝图，旨在放宽美国对这一处于中美经济竞争对手之间技术军备竞赛中心的产业的管理规定。【原文：The Trump administration is set to release a new artificial intelligence blueprint on Wednesday that aims to relax American rules governing the industry at the center of a technological arms race between economic rivals the U.S. and China.】

item.title: 洞察力：间谍蟑螂和人工智能机器人：德国规划未来战争
item.description: 德国计划到 2029 年将常规国防预算增加近两倍，达到每年约 1750 亿美元，其中大部分资金将用于重塑战争的本质。【原文：Germany plans to nearly triple its regular defense budget to around $175 billion per year by 2029, and much of that money will go into reinventing the nature of warfare.】

item.title: 特斯拉的季度业绩：投资者和车迷在看什么？
item.description: 特斯拉可能在本周三公布其十多年来最大的季度收入降幅，因为这家电动汽车制造商正在努力解决竞争加剧、缺乏新车型以及消费者对首席执行官埃隆-马斯克的反弹等问题。【原文：Tesla is likely to post its biggest drop in quarterly revenue in more than a decade on Wednesday, as the EV maker grapples with issues including increased competition, a lack of new models and consumer backlash against CEO Elon Musk.】

item.title: 英特尔芯片承包计划成为财报日焦点
item.description: 面对下滑的季度销售额和不断扩大的亏损，英特尔的股东们一定想知道新任首席执行官李布天对这家芯片制造商新生的合同制造业务有何计划。【原文：Faced with slumping quarterly sales and a burgeoning loss, Intel shareholders will want to know new CEO Lip Bu-Tan's plans for the chipmaker's nascent contract manufacturing business.】

item.title: 聚焦：绿色氢气退却对排放目标构成威胁
item.description: 绿色氢气开发商正在全球范围内取消项目和削减投资，这使得对化石燃料的依赖可能会超过预定目标。【原文：Green hydrogen developers are cancelling projects and trimming investments around the world, raising the prospect of longer than targeted reliance on fossil fuels.】

item.title: 被取消和推迟的绿色氢能项目
item.description: 由于生产成本上升以及对低碳燃料的需求疲软，许多绿色氢气开发商已经在全球范围内缩减了投资并取消了项目。【原文：Developers of green hydrogen have scaled back investments and scrapped projects globally as elevated production costs and weak demand for the low-carbon fuel have made many ventures unviable.】

item.title: 台湾贸易代表团赴华盛顿就潜在关税和贸易协议进行会谈
item.description: 台湾政府周三表示，由副总理率领的贸易代表团已抵达华盛顿特区，本周将与美国官员进行新一轮当面谈判。【原文：Taiwan's government said on Wednesday that a trade delegation led by the vice premier was in Washington, D.C., for a new round of in-person negotiations with U.S. officials this week.】

item.title: 澳大利亚慧科公司（WiseTech）在人工智能驱动的效率提升中裁减部分岗位
item.description: 澳大利亚慧科全球公司（WiseTech Global）周三证实，作为劳动力审查的一部分，该公司正在裁减一些职位，重点是 "通过自动化和使用人工智能最大限度地提高效率"。【原文：Australia's WiseTech Global confirmed on Wednesday it was cutting some roles as part of a workforce review to focus on "maximizing efficiency via automation and use of artificial intelligence".】

item.title: 关税风险给芯片需求前景蒙上阴影，德州仪器股价下挫
item.description: 德州仪器（Texas Instruments）的股价在周三的盘前交易中暴跌近 12%，因为该公司的季度利润预测显示，其模拟芯片的需求受到打击，这激起了投资者对关税相关干扰的担忧。【原文：Texas Instruments shares slumped nearly 12% in premarket trading on Wednesday, after its quarterly profit forecast indicated a hit to demand for its analog chips that stoked investor fears of tariff-related disruptions.】

item.title: 洞察力：大麻饮料抢夺销量，大型酒业公司准备反击
item.description: 顶级酒类制造商在大麻饮料热潮中一直袖手旁观，眼睁睁地看着 Cann 和 Wynk 等快速增长的大麻饮料品牌与啤酒和烈酒经销商达成交易，并在酒类商店的货架上获得宝贵的空间。【原文：Top alcohol makers have been sitting on the sidelines of a cannabis beverage boom, watching brands in the fast-growing category like Cann and Wynk make deals with beer and booze distributors, and gain valuable space on liquor store shelves.】

item.title: 德国研究显示，中国低估人民币汇率助长欧元区贸易逆差
item.description: 德国经济研究所（German Economic Institute）的一项研究表明，由于中国涉嫌操纵货币以保持人民币弱势，欧洲企业正面临着越来越大的压力，而欧盟领导人正在北京筹备旨在解决贸易争端的峰会。【原文：European companies are facing increasing pressure due to China's alleged currency manipulation to keep its yuan weak, a study by the German Economic Institute showed, as EU leaders prepared for a summit in Beijing aimed at navigating trade disputes.】

item.title: 中国公安部表示将加入加强对辅助驾驶监管的行列
item.description: 中国公安部周三表示，将与工业部和其他管理机构合作，加强对辅助驾驶系统的监管。【原文：China's public security ministry on Wednesday said it will cooperate with the industry ministry and other governing bodies to tighten regulation related to assisted driving systems.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）称，因头枕问题，Stellantis 将召回超过 12 万辆美国汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration）周三表示，克莱斯勒母公司斯特兰蒂斯公司（Stellantis）将在美国召回121398辆汽车，原因是这些汽车的头枕可能无法正常锁定，在发生碰撞时会增加乘员受伤的风险。【原文：Chrysler parent Stellantis is recalling 121,398 vehicles in the U.S. due to head restraints that may not lock properly and an increased risk of injury to the seat occupant during a crash, the U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Wednesday.】
